gurmukhi: AYsI inhwr kY mwr mcI joaU jIvq Qy qij ju`Du prwny ] sXwm BnY Aimtys ky swmuih Awhv my koaU n Tihrwny ]
transliteration: Aisinihaar Kai Maar Machijooo Jeevat The Taj(i) Juddh(u) Paraane|| Syaam Bhanai Amites Ke Saamuh(i) Aahav Me Ko( i)  Na Thaihraane||
translation: Seeing such a dreadful war, those warriors who were coming for fighting left and ran away from war-arena; no one could confront Amit Singh;

gurmukhi: jy br bIr khwvq hY bhu bwr iBry rn bwNiDq bwny ] so ieh BwNiq cly Bij kY ijm paun bhy dRum pwq aufwny ]1235]
transliteration: Je Bar Beer Kahaavat Hai Bahu Baar Bhire Ran Baandhit Baane|| So Eh Bhaant(i) Chale Bhaj(i) Kai Jim Paoun Bade Droum Paat Udaane||1235||
translation: Those who called themselves great warriors, and were roaming wielding many kings of weapons, they ran away from the battlefield like the leaves of a tree flying away before the blow of wind.1235.

gurmukhi: kyqy rhy rn mY rup kY ikqny Bij sXwm ky qIr pRkwry ] bIr Gny nhI jwq gny Aimtys blI iris swQ sMGwry ]
transliteration: Kete Rahe Ran Mai Roup Kai Kitne Bhaj(i) Syaam Ke Teer Poukdare|| Beer Ghane Nahijaat Gade Amites Baliris(i) Saath Sanhdare||
translation: Some of the warriors stood firmly in war and some of them, inflicted by the arrows of Krishna speed away from the field crying; Amit Singh killed many, they can’t be enumerated;

gurmukhi: bwj mry gjrwj pry su khUM rQ kwit kY BU pr fwry ] Awvq kw qumry mn mY krqw hrqw pRiqpwln hwry ]1236]
transliteration: Baaj Dare Gadraj Dare Su Kahoon Rath Kaattee Kai Bhoo Par Ddare|| Oovat Kaa Toumre Man Mai Karta Hartaa Pratipaalan Hdare||1236||
translation: Somewhere the horses, somewhere the elephants and somewhere the shattered chariots were lying on the ground; O Lord ! you are the creator, sustainer and the destroyer; What is in your mind, no one can understand.1236.

gurmukhi: rn Awqur hÍY suBt jo hir so ibnqI kIn ] qb iqn ko biRjrwj jU ieh ibiD au`qr dIn ]1237]
transliteration: Ran Aatur Hvai Soubhat Jo Har(i) So Bintikeen|| Tab Tin Ko Brijraaj Joo Eh Bidh(i) Outtar Deen||1237||
translation: When the warriors requested Krishna in the battlefield, greatly agitated, Krishna replied to them thus;1237.

gurmukhi: iniD bwr ibKY Aiq hI hT kY bhu mws rhXo qpu jwpu kIXo ] bhuro qij kY ipq mwq su BRwq Avws qjXo bnbws lIXo ]
transliteration: Nidh(i) Baar Bikhai At(i) Hihath Kai Bahu Maas Rahyo Tap(u) Jaap(u) Keeyo|| Bahuro Taj(i) Kai Pit Maat Su Bhraat Avaas Tajyo Banbaas Leeyo||
translation: Amit singh has persistently performed austerities and repeated the name of Lord for many months in the ocean; then he forsook his parents, home etc. and resided in the forest;

gurmukhi: iSv rIJ qpo Dn mY ieh ko khXo mwNg mhwN br qoih dIXo ] muih swmuih koaU n S`qR rhY bru dyhu iehY muiK mwNg lIXo ]1238]
transliteration: Shiv Reejh Tapo Dhan Mai Eh Ko Kahyo Maan Mahaan Bar Tohe Deeyo|| Muh(i) Saamuh(i) Maan Leeyo||1238||
translation: The god Shiva god pleased and asked him to implore for a boon and the boon that he begged for was that no enemy could confront him.1238.

gurmukhi: SyS suryS gnyS inSyS idnyS hU qy nhI jwie sMGwrXo ] so br pwie mhwN iSv qy Air ibMd nirMd ienI rn mwrXo ]
transliteration: Shesh Suresh Gnesh Nishesh Dinesh Hoo Te Nahijae Sanhdaryo|| So Bar Paae Mahaan Shiv Te Ar(i) Bind Narind Iniran Mdaryo||
translation: Even Indra, Sheshanaga, Ganesh, Chandra and Surya cannot kill him; after receiving the boon from Shiva, he has killed many kings;

gurmukhi: sUrn sO blbIr qbY ApunY muiK qy ieh BwNiq aucwrXo ] hau iqh sMGr ky smuhy miRq kI ibD pUC iehI ijX DwrXo ]1239]
transliteration: Sooran Sau Balbeer Tabai Apounai Moukh(i) Te Eh Bhaant(i) Ouchdaryo|| Hau Tih Sanadar Ke Samuhe Mrit Kibidh Poochh Ehijiya Dhdaryo||1239||
translation: I think that I should confront him and ask him about the manner of his death.1239.
